text:
Hello all! :wave:
Is there a way to track data clicks from anchor links? <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/insert-and-manage-anchor-links>
Or create a CTA that will not reload/redirect the page?

You can do this in a Marketing Hub Enterprise subscription using Behavioral Events. 

Events can be triggered by custom JavaScript or using a codeless browser extension 
• <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/analytics-tools/create-codeless-custom-behavioral-events|https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/analytics-tools/create-codeless-custom-behavioral-events>
• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/analytics/events|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/analytics/events>
Or If you don't have a Marketing Hubs Enterprise then you can use Google tag manager and set the event with element ( Specific class based) and save the conversion in GA4
